tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Lectures ( 
    lecture_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    lecture_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
    lecture_date DATE NOT NULL, 
    lecture_duration INT NOT NULL, 
    course_id INT NOT NULL, 
    material_url VARCHAR(255) 
);

CREATE TABLE Presentations ( 
    presentation_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    presentation_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
    presentation_date DATE NOT NULL, 
    presentation_duration INT NOT NULL, 
    course_id INT NOT NULL, 
    material_url VARCHAR(255) 
);

CREATE TABLE Assignments ( 
    assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    assignment_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
    assignment_due_date DATE NOT NULL, 
    max_score INT NOT NULL, 
    course_id INT NOT NULL, 
    material_url VARCHAR(255) 
);

CREATE TABLE lectures (
    lecture_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lecture_title VARCHAR(255),
    lecturer_name VARCHAR(255),
    lecture_date DATE,
    lecture_duration TIME
);

CREATE TABLE presentations (
    presentation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    presentation_title VARCHAR(255),
    presenter_name VARCHAR(255),
    presentation_date DATE,
    presentation_file BLOB
);

CREATE TABLE enrollments (
    enrollment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT,
    lecture_id INT,
    enrollment_date DATE,
    grade VARCHAR(2)
);
